references.reason: This paper introduces consistency models, a core methodology that underpins the accelerated generation capabilities of TurboHopp.

references.paper_title: Structure-based drug design with geometric deep learning
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of structure-based drug design (SBDD) methods, forming the foundation for TurboHopp's application in drug discovery.

references.paper_title: 3D equivariant diffusion for target-aware molecule generation and affinity prediction
references.reason: This paper introduces a 3D equivariant diffusion model for drug discovery, which is directly compared to and improved upon by TurboHopp.

references.paper_title: Diffhopp: A graph diffusion model for novel drug design via scaffold hopping
references.reason: This paper introduces DiffHopp, a baseline diffusion model for scaffold hopping that TurboHopp is directly compared against, highlighting the advancements of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Generating 3D molecules conditional on receptor binding sites with deep generative models
references.reason: This paper explores using deep generative models for 3D molecule generation, a technique that TurboHopp builds upon and enhances with its consistency-model approach.
